title: Measurement Lab
description: Measure the Internet. Save the data. Make it universally accessible and helpful.

footer.description: Measurement Lab(M-Lab) is a fiscally sponsored project of [Code for Science & Society (CS&S)](https://www.codeforsociety.org/)
footer.bottom: All original material on Measurement Lab is licensed under a [Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) license. M-Lab is a collaborative effort led by researchers in partnership with companies and other institutions.
